title: Finding the order in which the blocks were dropped

content.question: Based on the data presented in the graph, which of the following lists the points in the order in which the blocks are dropped onto the disk?

choices.label: <math alttext="A, B, C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A, B, C</mtext></math>
<math alttext="B, C, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B, C, A</mtext></math>
<math alttext="C, A, B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C, A, B</mtext></math>
<math alttext="B, A, C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B, A, C</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="B, A, C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B, A, C</mtext></math>

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
